00017 #ifndef GEN_RANDOM_H
00018 #define GEN_RANDOM_H
00019 
00020 #ifdef MT19937
00021 
00022 #include <limits.h>
00023 #include <mt19937.h>
00024 
00025 #define GEN_RAND_MAX UINT_MAX
00026 
00027 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void         GEN_srand(unsigned int seed) { init_genrand(seed); }
00028 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE unsigned int GEN_rand()                   { return genrand_int32(); }
00029 
00030 #else
00031 
00032 #include <stdlib.h>
00033 
00034 #define GEN_RAND_MAX RAND_MAX
00035 
00036 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void         GEN_srand(unsigned int seed) { srand(seed); } 
00037 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE unsigned int GEN_rand()                   { return rand(); }
00038 
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #endif
